p.b: This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

tr.td: Indicates that the concept is deprecated and should not be used

div.p: This case-sensitive code system http://ehealth.sundhed.dk/cs/clinicalimpression-finding-codes defines the following codes:

tr.td: Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates a red combination. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates at least one red combination found.

Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates a yellow combination. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates at least one yellow combination found and no red combinations found.

Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates a green combination. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates at least one green combination found and no red or yellow combinations found.
no effective answer significance for answer and question combination

Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates that answer did not meet any answer significance conditions. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates that no answer met the conditions of any answer significance(s) in the related question.
Ingen triageringsindikator for spørgsmål/svar-kombination har fundet anvendelse.
no answer significance defined for question(s)

Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates that the question did not have any answer significance. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates that no question had any associated answer significance(s).
Måledata (måling, spørgeskemabesvarelse eller billede) er ugyldiggjort
Ugyldiggørelse af måledata (måling, spørgeskemabesvarelse eller billede) er trukket tilbage

description.value: Indicates that the concept is deprecated and should not be used

definition.value: Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates a red combination. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates at least one red combination found.

Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates a yellow combination. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates at least one yellow combination found and no red combinations found.

Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates a green combination. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates at least one green combination found and no red or yellow combinations found.

display.value: no effective answer significance for answer and question combination

definition.value: Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates that answer did not meet any answer significance conditions. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates that no answer met the conditions of any answer significance(s) in the related question.

value.value: Ingen triageringsindikator for spørgsmål/svar-kombination har fundet anvendelse.

display.value: no answer significance defined for question(s)

definition.value: Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates that the question did not have any answer significance. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates that no question had any associated answer significance(s).

value.value: Måledata (måling, spørgeskemabesvarelse eller billede) er ugyldiggjort
Ugyldiggørelse af måledata (måling, spørgeskemabesvarelse eller billede) er trukket tilbage
